comments.body:
Hi @AndrewGaspar,

You need to add the `--module commonjs` flag to `runner.ts` file (https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/_infrastructure/tests/runner.ts#L31). The `runner.js` file is generated with:

```
tsc _infrastructure/tests/runner.ts -out _infrastructure/tests/runner.js
```
